title-group.article-title: Where Angels Fear to Tread: Richard Schoenherr (1935-1996)

abstract.p: Richard Schoenherr, professor of sociology at the University of Wisconsin—Madison, passed away unexpectedly on 9 January 1996. He is memorialized in this essay for his scholarly contributions in the areas of teaching, research, and service.
